title: Political Economy
prompt: A weathered wooden table in a rural community center or church basement, scattered with maps, handwritten notes, and documents showing regulatory frameworks and stakeholder names, captured in soft afternoon light streaming through a window; hands of multiple people (visible only from wrists down) pointing at different sections, suggesting discussion and coalition-building around shared purpose; muted earth-tone walls in background, worn wooden floors, the texture of genuine deliberation rather than polished presentation.
